__e: Marty, I'm sorry, but I'm afraid you're stuck here.
Marty, I didn't know you were home.
And, no, Marty, I'm not talking about having sex with your wife.
Marty's a young man. He probably would be able to be up and about in three weeks.
With Mom and Dad gone, you and Uncle Marty are the only family I have.
Is there anybody here who thinks Marty is good at his job? Huh?
Well, I'm here. Okay? I came to see Marty from the 38th.
Well, I suppose it don't mean a thing, Marty. It's all in your mind.
Marty and I are going to be spending a lot more time over here.
Take this back to Marty and let him know what you're doing.
Marty, we just quit our jobs and leave cause our son's having problems.
Marty, don't tell me you think he didn't do it.
- Marty is not the guy you think he is.
Marty, could you help your mother with the kitchen things?
Because, Marty, you were never this good before.
Seriously, Marty, did you really do all the things you say you did?
